content: 'Poster presentations provide researchers with a unique opportunity to present and to receive direct feedback from an expert audience about significant work in progress, bleeding-edge work, or research that is best communicated in an interactive or graphical fashion.
Label: N

content: 'We invite you to submit an extended abstract of no longer than 4 pages for poster presentation, in the general areas of databases, information retrieval, and knowledge management, especially posters bridging these areas, or presenting new perspectives in these areas. A full list of current topics of interest can be found at http://www.cikm2011.org/callforpapers.
Label: N

content: 'All extended abstracts for posters will be reviewed and published in the ACM CIKM proceedings, which will be distributed in CD-ROM at the conference. Submissions of extended abstracts for posters must be in English and should not exceed 4 pages in ACM CIKM Proceedings format including references and figures. The ACM camera-ready templates are available at: http://www.acm.org/sigs/publications/proceedings-templates.
Label: N

content: 'As with full papers, authors are required to anonymize their submission and conceal their identity. Poster papers must be submitted electronically via the posters submission web page.
Label: N

content: 'Late submissions will be rejected without further consideration.
Label: N

content: 'Queries regarding poster submissions should be sent to the Posters Chair: Gianni Amati (posters@cikm2011.org)
Label: N
